comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ghostpirate.biz on September 05, 2023, 07:00:00 AM>>snip<<I think it's much better you make such a post or an announcement plus updates about your exchanger in the Russian Local board. This is a wrong board to post this, and it's not accepted.It also makes no sense to post Russian language in the board where most members know English. It's just a waste of time on your side as well, the fact that they won't get the message unless if they translate it.
